article.headline: DePaul 77, East Carolina 56
article.story: ROSEMONT, Ill. (AP) -- Quemont Greer scored 21 points and Drake Diener and Sammy Mejia had 19 apiece Saturday to lead DePaul to a 77-56 win over East Carolina. Greer, Conference USA's leading scorer, had 16 points in the second half and Diener hit three three-pointers to tie the school's career record with 164. The Blue Demons (12-4, 4-1) have now won four straight. Mike Cook scored 14 points and Moussa Badiane added 11 points for East Carolina (5-13, 0-6), which lost its eighth straight. Coming out flat after Thursday's stirring 13-point win over No. 25 Marquette, DePaul trailed 26-17 before pulling into a 30-30 halftime tie. The Blue Demons then opened the second half with a 10-1 run as Greer made two baskets and Diener and Mejia hit three-pointers. After East Carolina closed to within 54-45 on Tom Hammond's three-pointer, DePaul outscored the Pirates 23-11 down the stretch. East Carolina, which was coming off a 51-point loss at 14th-ranked Louisville Wednesday, shot just 35.2 percent from the field including 20.7 percent in the second half. The Pirates had taken a 26-17 lead with a 9-0 run as Cook made a jumper, a three-pointer and a lay-in. But DePaul rallied with a 13-4 spurt of its own as LeVar Seals made three baskets including a three-pointer. Greer, who entered the contest averaging 21 points per game, has now scored 20 or more points in 11 of his last 13 games, including a school-record eight straight from Dec. 1-Jan. 6.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
